pageProduct.name: Pinetarsol Solution 200mL Shower Pump
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Soap-free cleanser for inflamed skin. Pinetarsol Solution Shower Pack helps to reduce redness and relieve itching while gently cleansing the skin. Suitable for use on the whole body, it’s an effective way to treat large areas of red, itchy skin.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Always read the label and use only as directed. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

Helps to relieve itching and inflammation associated with a range of skin conditions, such as dermatitis, eczema, psoriasis, chicken pox, nappy rash, sunburn, prickly heat, hives, insect bites, anal and genital itching.
• Gently cleanses without irritating inflamed skin like soap can.
• Helps break the "itch–scratch cycle".
• pH-balanced to maintain the skin’s natural protection.
• Recommended for normal to oily skin.

Ingredients

Tar (Pine tar) 2.3% w/w, triethanolamine lauryl sulfate 6% w/w.Preservative:  Phenethyl alcohol

Directions

Pump cap contains 10ml. For very inflamed skin, use with water. Shake bottle before use.
Shower: Apply directly to wet skin, leave a few minutes, briefly rinse. Pat skin dry.
Bath: Add 15-30 ml* to a warm to tepid bath (5ml* in a baby's bath or hand basin). Bathe for 5-10 minutes once daily, more often in severe cases. Pat skin dry. 
For small areas/patients in bed: Add 10ml to 3L of water, sponge, pat skin dry.
